"Dual Sword(Double Saber)":
"\"Dual Sword\" (Double Saber),
due to its wide melee attack range, is a weapon that can be used in a variety of situations.

When using a PA,\"Kamaitachi\" will occur,
causing surrounding enemies to be damaged for a certain time.
Kamaitachi has varying stages of power that can be strengethed by continued use of PAs."

"PA\"Julien Dance\",
after attacking an enemy from the rear,
will cause a continuous attack on the spot.

If attacking from the rear, another attack could be launched before beginning the continuous attack,
allowing for movement around the target."
